data.text: - This is a two folded question.

translation.text: - Đây là một câu hỏi hai lần.

data.text: First of all, do I encourage people to start a business

data.text: or buy an existing business?

translation.text: hoặc mua một doanh nghiệp hiện có?

data.text: I do encourage for most people buying a business

data.text: is actually better, is a better idea, I'll explain why.

translation.text: thực sự tốt hơn, là một ý tưởng tốt hơn, tôi sẽ giải thích tại sao.

data.text: (upbeat music)

translation.text: (Âm nhạc lạc quan)

data.text: Just imagine this, let's say pretend that you want to fly

data.text: yeah go ahead, just put that together,

data.text: That's pretty much what starting a business is like,

data.text: Now buying into an existing business, on the other hand,

title: Starting A Business Or Buying A Business? Which One Is Better? - Boss In The Bentley
